p: Ferula ammoniacum aerial parts were collected from the hilly areas of village Yar Khan Banda (Kondoly), Timergara Dir (Lower), Pakistan in 2019. The plant was identified by plant taxonomist Prof. Mehboob-ur-Rahman, PGC, Swat, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. The plant specimens were deposited with voucher number BGH.UOM.163 in the Botanical Garden Herbarium, University of Malakand, Pakistan.
